categoryAnswers.answerText: My hobbies are very different depending on which country I'm in. So, right now I'm in Japan and I don't really do too much other than play video games but when I'm in the United States, then I'm playing online games, Guild Wars 2 and I do lots of archery. I shoot archery with the USC Archery Club and I do it here too. They call it Kyudo, you know, which is like, very you know, a super cool way of doing archery but I really like doing that for sport.
